What is (are) Childhood Soft Tissue Sarcoma ?,"Key Points
							                    - Childhood soft tissue sarcoma is a disease in which malignant (cancer) cells form in soft tissues of the body.    - Soft tissue sarcoma occurs in children and adults.    - Having certain diseases and inherited disorders can increase the risk of childhood soft tissue sarcoma.     - The most common sign of childhood soft tissue sarcoma is a painless lum
